titleStmt.title: Sir Thomas Ouerburie his wife with new elegies vpon his (now knowne) vntimely death : whereunto are annexed, new newes and characters / written by himselfe and other learned gentlemen.
titleStmt.author: Overbury, Thomas, Sir, 1581-1613.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Edward Griffin for Laurence L'isle, and are to bee sold at his shop at the Tigers head in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Date of imprint defaced; date suggested by STC (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University. Library.
